News.headline: BT Sport Final Match Selections
News.short_description: Important information regarding BT Sport's final TV match selections
News.description:
BT and the Vanarama National League have confirmed that there will be live broadcasts of a National League match on the following dates, with agreement in place with the National League that fixture selections can be made at short notice: 

Friday 14th April, KO 15:00 
Monday 17th April, KO 15:00 
Saturday 22nd April, KO 12.15 
Saturday 29th April, KO 12.15

The National League has agreed that the match scheduled for the 22nd Arpril can be decided by BT Sport following the conclusion of the fixtures that take place on Monday 17th April.

This is to ensure that the fixture with the most at stake in the championship run-in is broadcast and not a "dead-rubber" and as such a number of fixtures that could be chosen for live broadcast on the 22nd April, which includes our final away game of the season against Wrexham FC. 

This fixture is now subject to a change in kick-off time from 3.00pm to 12.15pm.

The live fixture selection for Saturday 29th April will be made following the results in the Vanarama National League on Saturday 22nd April.

Supporters are asked to take note of the above, although the only game that will be subject to a change in kick-off time is that chosen for the 22nd April.
